Body:
"""Get / Set trigger source."""
with expected_protocol(ik.teledyne.MAUI, [init, 'TRIG_SELECT?',
    'TRIG_SELECT?', 'TRIG_SELECT EDGE,SR,EX'], ['EDGE,SR,C1,HT,OFF',
    'EDGE,SR,C1,HT,OFF'], sep='\n') as osc:
    assert osc.trigger_source == osc.TriggerSource.c0
    osc.trigger_source = osc.TriggerSource.ext
